title: vArum dEvadEvA (sj)
sahitya:
vArum dEvadEvA ingu vArum unadaDimai manamagizha


1:  vArum mAyalOkamIdE AbrahAm dEvanAga
 caraNam 2    shuddha parishuddhanE karttanE enrumE aDiyEnuDanE irundE tuNai seyya
 caraNam 3    ArumaTra nAnenai Adarikka vA unaiviDa vEru takkadOriDam yAduminri nalittiDum enakkuyir
pEru mikkavE tara pAvamaTra kani mari maganena pEru paTrumE baliyAga dattamiDu puigazhidu bhuvi
kUra valladO tril\Okasm valladE ini nEsamuTra manadoDu nidamum malADi paNiya dinam krpai puriya
 caraNam 4    ayyanE meyyanE aruL karanE anburuvamAga varum engaL paranE 
engum niraivE pongum maraiyE tanga duraiyE dayavuDan enadiDam
 caraNam 5    bAdhakan enat-tAmadittiDAi pAzhulagidin kuTrattE kArum en vinai
tIrum un tudi sEr iDam vasittattE kUriDa nI vA vA nEriDa sutti dEvAnaraN
muttattE ini varavum enakk-aruLE unai mana malaroDu aDi tozha
 caraNam 6    tAparam ena nambi vandEn taruvena uyir tandAi dayavuDan
inum enai santatam cintittE dinamE uyarvAi vaLarppAi magizhura
tAi uruvena vandE Adari tavaruTrAl kAraNam nI arindE
vEruDan iDar kalaindE pADiDa varam taruvAi dinam tudittiDa
